description: Luffy grabs an opponent's face with his stretched feet, pulls his legs back, and then slams the opponent down with tremendous force. Similar to Gomu Gomu no Mallet (Gavel) but performed with the legs instead of the arms while in mid-air.

firstUse.context: Luffy used this technique while trapped in Don Krieg's net, improvising a leg-based attack to defeat Krieg by slamming him into the Baratie's fin.

notes: This technique showcases Luffy's combat creativity and his ability to use his Devil Fruit powers with his legs as effectively as with his arms. The Gear 2 version is called Gomu Gomu no Jet Hammer.
